#summary Setting up Read Text Extension - Command and Script Tokens

= Command and Script Tokens =

[File:Dialog3.png]

When you need these values in a command or a script use the appropriate token. When the add-on is executed, the value in brackets is replaced by the actual string required.

* '''(AUTHOR)''': Name of the author
* '''(COUNTRY_CODE)''': Your country
* '''(CREATE_QR_LABEL_PY)''': A Python script to create a QR code
* '''(DATE)''': The current date
* '''(ESPEAK_READ_TEXT_PY)''': A Python script
* '''(FESTIVAL_READ_TEXT_PY)''': A Python script
* '''(HOME)''': Your home directory
* '''(LANGUAGE_CODE)''': Your language code
* '''(LANGUAGE_COUNTRY_CODE)''': Your country and language
* '''(NETWORK_READ_TEXT_PY)''': A Python script
* '''(NOW)''': Current time reformatted so you can use it in a file name
* '''(OOO_WEBTEXT)''': The first 9999 letters of the selected text encoded as part of a URL
* '''(OOO_WEBTEXT250)''': The first 249 letters of the selected text encoded as part of a URL
* '''(OOO_WEBTEXTBIG)''': The first 9999 letters of the selected text encoded as part of a URL
* '''(OOO_WEBTEXTSMALL)''': The first 99 letters of the selected text encoded as part of a URL
* '''(OPENJTALK_READ_TEXT_PY)''': A Python program (Japanese)
* '''(PICO_READ_TEXT_PY)''': A Python script
* '''(PIPER_READ_TEXT_PY)''': A Python script
* '''(RESET_ALL)''': Return to default settings
* '''(RHVOICE_READ_TEXT_PY)''': A Python script
* '''(SAY_APPLESCRIPT)''': A MacOS platform voice synthesis script
* '''(SELECTION_COUNTRY_CODE)''': The country of the selected text
* '''(SELECTION_LANGUAGE_CODE)''': The language of the selected text
* '''(SELECTION_LANGUAGE_COUNTRY_CODE)''': The regional code of the  selected text
* '''(SESSION_ID)''': The session identifier
* '''(SOUND_GALLERY)''': File path to the application's sound gallery
* '''(SPD_READ_TEXT_PY)''': A Posix platform voice synthesis script
* '''(TIME)''': Current spoken time in the region
* '''(TITLE)''': Name of the document
* '''(TMP)''': Full path and temporary file name containing the selected  text 
* '''(TTS_WSCRIPT_VBS)''': A Windows platform voice synthesis script
* '''(UNIQUE_ID)''': A one-time use user identifier
* '''(USER_ID)''': An anonymous user identifier
* '''(WEEKDAY)''': Current day of the week as spoken in the region
